xc.name: Agent Jack Donovan
xc.appearance: Muscular build with a buzz cut

json_to_edit.voice_over: Little did we know, the mask held powers beyond our wildest imaginations.
json_to_edit.description: Dr. Emily Hawthorne discovers an ancient mask in a hidden temple chamber.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Dripping water, distant echoes, subtle wind
json_to_edit.name: The Mask of Transformation
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Dr. Emily Hawthorne uncovers an ancient mask that brings forth a new identity, witnessed by skeptical and intrigued onlookers.

qa.action: Aerial view of a dense jungle, revealing a partially hidden ancient temple.

hf.action: Dr. Hawthorne and her team approach the entrance of the temple.

tr.action: The team pushes open a heavy stone door, revealing a dark passage.

xc.action: The camera follows the team as they navigate through narrow, winding corridors.

ka.action: The group enters a vast chamber filled with ancient artifacts and hieroglyphs.

fn.action: Dr. Hawthorne's hands carefully remove a dusty cloth, revealing the ornate mask.

af.action: Marcus Rivera examines the mask skeptically while Zara Okoye looks on with concern.

qo.action: Dr. Hawthorne's eyes widen as she slowly lifts the mask towards her face.

fp.action: A sudden gust of wind sweeps through the chamber as Dr. Hawthorne puts on the mask.

va.action: The team reacts in shock as Dr. Hawthorne's appearance begins to change dramatically.

edit_command: Transform the scene into a modern-day heist at a high-tech museum, keeping the mask as the central artifact but changing the characters to a team of professional thieves.

label.rationale: we will transform the scene into a modern-day heist at a high-tech museum while keeping the mask as the central artifact and changing the characters to a team of professional thieves. this transformation will require significant changes to the scene's setting, characters, and actions, while maintaining the core element of the mysterious mask. we'll update the location, lighting, ambience, and shots to reflect a high-tech museum environment. the characters will be reimagined as skilled thieves with specific roles in the heist. the overall structure of the scene will remain similar, but the context and details will be adapted to fit the new heist scenario.
